name: Daydreaming (hamyah, sofbrook, MeikoBruxami, MiguelSeabra1999)
description:
You play as Katherine, a young adult with a severe case of daydreaming and a short attention span. Help her organize a surprise birthday party for one of her friends, but be careful not to spoil it ;)

In Dreaming, you have to endure bullet mazes and challenges to make sure you don't slip up in conversation and say something you didn't mean. There are multiple types of challenges that you will encounter in your path.

The team:

Andreia Santos, art
Miguel Seabra, programming
Paulo do Ó, programming
Sofia Ribeiro, art
